definitions.definition: A covered entrance to a building, whether taken from the interior, and forming a sort of vestibule within the main wall, or projecting without and with a separate roof. A porch often has chair(s) , table(s) and swings.
examples: He sat on his porch , waiting for his friend to come over.

definitions.definition: The platform outside the external hatch of a spacecraft .

main_definition: ( architecture ) A covered entrance to a building, whether taken from the interior, and forming a sort of vestibule within the main wall, or projecting without and with a separate roof. A porch often has chair(s) , table(s) and swings.
secondary_definitions: The platform outside the external hatch of a spacecraft .
